class.name: franka_planner_control/ImpedanceControlPathExecute
class.description: A controller that tracks a cartesian path with a joint impedance controller that compensates coriolis torques. The torque commands are compared to measured torques in Console outputs.

class.name: franka_planner_control/SelectorErgStaticMoveController
class.description: A controller that follows a path planned by MoveIt and adapts it with the ERG strategy. Experiments are executed in a static pre-programmed environment with pre-programmed pose references.

class.name: franka_planner_control/ErgStaticMoveController
class.description: The trajectory-based ERG that lets the robot move to a desired reference. Experiments are executed in a static pre-programmed environment with pre-programmed pose references.

class.name: franka_planner_control/ErgDynamicStayController
class.description: The trajectory-based ERG keeps the robot in the initial configuration while avoiding the human seen by the ZED 2 camera.

class.name: franka_planner_control/SelectorErgDynamicMoveController
class.description: The trajectory-based ERG keeps the robot in the initial configuration while avoiding the human seen by the ZED 2 camera.

class.name: franka_planner_control/PandaModelController
class.description: A controller that evaluates and prints the dynamic model of Franka
